content: schnee stocking materials us 7 knitting needles worsted weight yarn scissors yarn needle gauge 16 sts and 19 row = 4 inches pattern cast on 56 stitches or any multiple of 14 stitches in the main color join in the round and work k2 p2 rib for 10 rounds work one knit round in the main color join in the contrasting color and work 48 rounds following the chart work a short-row heel in the main color work 18 more rounds continuing in the chart for the foot-portion finish with a rounded toe in the main color kitchener stitch to close the toe break yarns and weave in ends
